content:
IETF WEBDAV Working Group Meeting

IETF-49, San Diego, California
December 13, 2000

A meeting of the WEBDAV Working Group was held December 13, 2000 at the Sheraton San Diego, as part of IETF-49.

Meeting Information

Minutes
